quotes.quote: By perseverance the snail reached the ark.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: The difference between perseverance and obstinacy is that one comes from a strong will; and the other from a strong won't.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: You have to keep plugging away. We are all growing. There is no shortcut. You have to put time into it to build an audience
quotes.author: John Gruber

quotes.quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: If you wish success in life, make perseverance your bosom friend, experience your wise counselor, caution your elder brother and hope your guardian genius.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Perseverance is more prevailing than violence; and many things which cannot be overcome when they are together, yield themselves up when taken little by little.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson
